meanings.definition: The quality or state of being splendid or magnificent.
meanings.sent1: The splendiferousnesses of the sunset took my breath away.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was adorned with splendiferousnesses, making her the belle of the ball.
meanings.sent3: The cake's splendiferousnesses were so impressive that it seemed almost too beautiful to eat.
meanings.sent4: The artist captured the splendiferousnesses of nature in his painting.
meanings.sent5: The splendiferousnesses of the fireworks display lit up the night sky.

meanings.sent3: The splendiferousnesses of the castle made it a popular tourist attraction.
